name: Klexos (pk-games)
description:
Play as a mysterious character as he traverses through the many unique and mind bending levels of Klexos.  Test your skills in trying to master each level, but beware! Gifted with the ability to create a memory where you can return also comes with a price as you tear yourself out of time and space. Like any time traveller, the last thing you want to do is run into your past self, especially when they become your own worst enemy.

Do you have what it takes to master Klexos?
